description: The chatbot offers real-time, personalized medical advice and tailored treatment recommendations.
The system uses multimodal AI to analyze data and accurately diagnose diseases, asking follow-up questions if needed.
The image analysis feature uses AI to examine medical images, detecting anomalies and assisting in accurate disease diagnosis.
The dataset generation feature produces synthetic medical data to improve AI model accuracy for diagnosis and treatment.
The Connect with Doctor feature links users to healthcare professionals for personalized advice and treatment.
